result.arabic_text: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ
result.translation: Isiniif ishee (beyladoota wareegaa) keessa faaydaaleetu jira hanga beellama murtaa’eetti. Sana booda iddoon ishee (bakkiti itti qalamtu) gara Mana turaa (daangaa harama Makkaa)ti.
